title: Now
feedback: Today, my focus is razor-sharp: Networking & Security, Ethical Hacking, and Software Development. That’s it. Talk to me if you need anything related to routing and switching, full-stack web apps of any kind, or building solutions to real-world problems. At the end of the day, making the world a better place through tech is my ultimate goal.
